Title: Relates to standards relating to hydrofluorocarbon substances
Summary: Relates to standards relating to hydrofluorocarbon substances; provides that any rules or regulations relating to hydrofluorocarbon substances established or implemented by the department of environmental conservation shall conform with, and shall not exceed, any applicable rules or regulations set forth in 40 C.F.R. Part 84, as in effect on October first, two thousand twenty-five.
LawCode: Amd ยง19-0301, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to standards relating to hydrofluorocarbon substances
